name: Primitive Resentment
description:
Primitive Resentment is a point and click narrative experience that has the player explore a mysterious facility that hides many dark secrets. It mixes elements of comedy with a darker, more brutal story to create a contrast between the two styles in an attempt to make a unique atmosphere. 

Inspired by the short story by Myles Blasonato "Primal Fury"

When choosing your resolution when the game begins, make sure to pick the size that matches your screen settings, or aspects of the game will break.

This game contains elements of blood and some text descriptions of gruesome imagery. If this sort of content disturbs you, be warned.
